flawed_nl_solution:
He had 80-20=<<80-20=50>>50 after the donation
He kept 50/2=<<50/2=25>>25 after giving half to his brother
So he has 25*3=<<25*3=75>>75 coins
He then does 1 more donation and has 75-10=<<75-10=65>>65 coins left
#### 65

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
